segments.text: Can we choose a time to look at houses together ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you do that in the mornings , or would the afternoons be best ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Either way is good for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are a number of open houses this weekend in your area . Would that okay with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can take a little time off of work , or I can go on a weekend , also .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could meet at the real estate office , or I could pick you up at your home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am leaving from work , so maybe I could just meet you at the first house that we will look at .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can think of five houses that we should look at . It will take most of the day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to see as many as possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I have confirmed the times with the owners , I will e-mail you our plans for the day .
segments.speaker: S2
